title: Emigre Matrix Typeface
content:
What is a good typeface that compliments Matrix?

[http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=105](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430074230/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=105 "http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=105")
author: ivank

comments.content: I was planning on designing a logo using Matrix.I wanted to get other peoples opinions on what typeface they thought would compliment Matrix.
I think Stephen wants to know ’for what’ because the information surrounding the logo (ie context) is important to font selection.
The logo is for a Deconstructionist Furniture Company.
I rather like Franklin Gothic for body text with Matrix for headings.
I guess the question is… why do you want to use matrix for this? Rhetorically speaking.
